title: 46: Lil Kylie Talks Fetishes, OnlyFans, and The Sausage Castle
itunes:title: Lil Kylie Talks Fetishes, OnlyFans, and The Sausage Castle
description:
Lil Kylie lives big and has overcome a ton of trials and tribulations to be the entertainment success story she is today. She joins Bunnie to talk about surviving childhood trauma and shares how she got into the adult entertainment business. Lil Kylie and Bunnie also talk about what really goes down at the Sausage Castle, how much money she makes off OnlyFans, and they play a raunchy version of “Never Have I Ever”. 

 

Takeaways:

  • Lil Kylie is 3’10 with a beautiful booty for days. She was born in Tulsa, OK and lifted herself up out of childhood trauma and pain from losing her mother and sister early on in life. 
  • Kylie shares her experiences as a sex worker and explains why she had people out there protecting her. Like Bunnie, she learned so much on the streets that she carries with her in her professional life today. 
  • The girls that Bunnie saw make the most money at strip clubs were the ones who looked different. Men love different body types and styles — not just one cookie-cutter look!
  • Crazy things go down at The Sausage Castle, home of party legend Mike Busey. Kylie and Bunnie both have their own stories from this fun factory for adults. 
  • Lil Kylie does everything on her OnlyFans, and we mean everything. She makes great money doing it and loves connecting with her fans on the platform. 
  • Kylie is focused more than ever on getting healthy and past some addiction issues. Bunnie is going to send her the vitamin regimen that will get her to feel like a million bucks.

 

Quotes: 

  • “It’s okay to cry.” 
  • “I don’t understand — why is everyone obsessed with anal?”
  • “I was having anal one time, and I got some poop balls in the bed. It was so bad, and I was feeling so hot.” - B

 

Mentioned: 

Lil Kylie: Instagram | Only Fans | Facebook 

Ep #12 with Viking Barbie 

The Sausage Castle 

Jelly Roll: Twitter | Website | Instagram | YouTube
